description: A comprehensive collection of Nepali Christian Tharu songs with lyrics, chords, and videos.
features: Search songs by title or singer
usage: Tap any song to view lyrics
Tap 'All Singers' to browse by artist
Use zoom controls (A+/A-) for text size
Toggle chords on/off in lyrics view
